## RouterMiddlewareManager class

Router middleware manager implementation Manages router-level middleware registration, composition, and conditional execution

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RouterMiddlewareManager implements IRouterMiddlewareManager 
```
**Implements:** [IRouterMiddlewareManager](./koatty_router.iroutermiddlewaremanager.md)
